data.title: Nevada Department of Motor Vehicles Official Website
data.meta_description: The Nevada Department of Motor Vehicles issues drivers licenses, vehicle registrations and license plates in the Silver State.
data.text:
Rapid Registration Has Arrived!

Online registration has never been easier. With our new system, you can upload documents to the DMV remotely through the DriveNV portal and skip a trip to the office.

Eligible users for Rapid Registration are:

Customers who have purchased a vehicle from an out-of-state dealership.

Customers who have purchased a vehicle from a private party or was gifted a vehicle.

Customers who have purchased a vehicle from a private party with a lien holder.

New residents to Nevada who have not yet registered their vehicle in the state.

See more information on Rapid Registration here.

Make An Appointment.

If your transaction can't be completed online, book an appointment at one of our offices in Carson City, Henderson, Las Vegas, or Reno. If there isn't anything available to meet your needs, check back as people cancel all the time and new appointments open up.
